abstract.para:
The Easy Publish and Consume library provides an easy method to
publish data per HTTPS announce that information via DNS-DS find that information and finally consume it

chapter.title: Consuming
chapter.para: These objects and functions are used to consume Easy Publish and Consume resources. To use them link with libepc and include its headers, for instance by checking for libepc-1.0 with pkg-config.

chapter.title: Publishing
chapter.para: These objects and functions are used to publish Easy Publish and Consume resources. To use them link with libepc and include its headers, for instance by checking for libepc-1.0 with pkg-config.

chapter.title: Widgets
chapter.para: These widgets perform common tasks when using the Easy Publish and Consume library. To use them link with libepc-ui and include its headers, for instance by checking for libepc-ui-1.0 with pkg-config.

chapter.title: Internal API
chapter.para: The objects and functions listed in this chapter are intended for internal library use only.
